traits.name: Aura of Protection
entries: Ramius and any ally that starts their turn within 30 feet of him have a +4 bonus to all saving throws and resistance to nonmagical damage.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6 damage) slashing damage or 11 ({@dice 1d10 + 6}) if wielded in two hands, plus 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage. If the target is an evil creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or take an additional 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Divine Wave {@recharge}
entries: Ramius strikes the ground and causes holy energy to radiate outwards. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. Targets take 21 (6d6 damage) thunder damage plus 21 (6d6 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are knocked down (have the {@condition prone} condition).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ramius casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
